hero.hero-quote: "Education is what remains after one has forgotten, what one has learned in school" <cite class="style-p" translate="no"> ~ Albert Einstein</cite>

project.project-p: These are the last projects I worked on

about.about-description: I am a web developer who enjoys doing the layout and interactivity of web interfaces, as well as optimization, for the good positioning and loading performance of websites and applications. I have experience in the frontend and backend, being considered a full-stack javascript developer. I also have experience in Content Marketing, SEO and Video Game Development.

contact.contact-nameError: Name must be from 3 to 20 digits and can only contain letters
contact.contact-lastnameError: Last name must be from 3 to 20 digits and can only contain letters
contact.contact-emailError: Email can only contain letters, numbers, points, hyphens and underscores
contact.contact-numberError: Phone number must be from 7 to 12 digits and can only contain numbers
